title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1920.1 - Purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1920.1 - Purposes

State Regulations

These regulations implement the provisions of Article
XVIII-A of the Private Housing Finance Law (the Act) which establishes a
program to provide grants or loans which shall be used to pay for all or a
portion of the project costs of constructing or rehabilitating turnkey/enhanced
rental projects, which shall thereafter be owned by eligible owners for the
benefit of persons of low income. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1920.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
